programme.title: Leveraging Supplier Diversity to Grow Black Wealth
programme.desc: Entrepreneurship is a key pathway to wealth creation, and the capacity to do business as a supplier of goods and services to global corporations is a proven strategy to transition from small start-up to emerging growth company. ManuLife John Hancock Chief Procurement Officer Guarav Saini joins Beyond The Hype to share how partnering with diverse suppliers to power corporate performance can also drive Black wealth creation through entrepreneurship.

programme.title: Backstage with Bell Biv DeVoe
programme.desc: We go backstage with Bell Biv DeVoe as they get ready for their long-anticipated New Edition reunion tour. Then we catch up with Curtis Benjamin, the founder of Save Our Daughters.” Hes on a mission to help daughters around the country. Then we talk to Ron Hickland, the engineer behind some of Americas top performing bowling balls. Hes shows us the career benefits of a STEM education. And finally, Dr. Khalil Muhammad shows us how hes lifting his community through the Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture.

programme.title: CEO Jo Ann Jenkins is on a mission to change and rebrand AARP
programme.desc: We talk to Jo Ann Jenkins, CEO of AARP, about her initiative to rebrand itself as an organization. She wants the organizations members to know getting older doesnt mean spending life in a rocking chair. Plus, Lori Ann Douglas sits down with our correspondent, Shartia Brantley, to discuss the warning signs of Financial Infidelity. It can leave a spouse devastated. Germaine Bolds-Leftridge, president & founder of GBL Sales, sponsors the annual Ubiquitous Hair & Health Trade Show. And Actress Lorraine Toussaint visits our studio to offer a little advice on life. And finally, we profile Joyce Williams, a jewelry designer who uses organic material to accessorize and transform gems into a work of art.

programme.title: Eyes On | What We Know About the Mid Air Collision
programme.desc: Today we are joined by Dr. Randolph Mahoney, a retired widebody Captain for a major US airline, having recently completed 37 years of service. He is also a former Naval Aviator, Naval Aviation Safety Officer, and Naval Flight Instructor. In both his civilian and military roles, he has participated in mishap investigations, and helped develop safety and training programs. He holds FAA certificates as an Airline Transport Pilot, and also has commercial pilot privileges in aircraft and helicopters, as well as being a Certified Flight Instructor and Advanced Ground Instructor. Having flown extensively in the National Capital Area, he is very familiar with Reagan National Airport and operations there.

programme.title: Stealing Rodin
programme.desc: Stealing Rodin tells the unforgetable story of the greatest art theft in Chiles history. In 2005, the Palace of Fine Arts in Santiago, hosted a collection by celebrated French sculptor Auguste Rodin. The morning after the exhibit’s opening, museum guards were dismayed to find that one of the Rodin pieces had gone missing. The "theft" turned out to be a provocative statement, masterminded by a precocious art student. His actions sparked a public outcry and a furious debate on the nature of art itself.

programme.title: Paranormal Terror in North America
programme.desc: Paranormal terror comes in all shapes and sizes; including ghostly apparitions, disembodied voices and even extraterrestrial beings. The skies above Falcon Lake, Manitoba have been plagued for decades with sightings of flying objects, and unexplained streaks of light. A geologist saw a large glowing object descend and as he moved closer, he could see and hear strange beings. When the craft suddenly left, the man had large circular burn marks all over his chest. The Blue Ghost Tunnel running beneath the Weland Canal in St. Catherine’s, Ontario, was once the scene of a fatal train wreck. Visitors to this paranormal hot spot can witness misty spirits, unexplainable lights and a variety of spine tingling sounds. An innocent farmhand accused of murdering his lover’s husband was hanged at the Charlotte County Gaol. For one hundred years thereafter guards and inmates alike claimed to have heard his voice echoing through the cell blocks; proclaiming his innocence. Prepare for an exciting thrill ride to some of Canada's most haunted locations.

programme.title: Weather Control: Global Warming or Human Manipulation?
programme.desc: A phased array transmitter stands two hundred miles east of Anchorage, Alaska with the ability to beam more than 3 billion watts of energy into the ionosphere. What is its purpose? Why is this modern-day antennae farm located in this desolate spot?

programme.title: Forbidden Science - Clone Fantasy
programme.desc: Forbidden Science is a unique blend of noir science fiction and erotic programming. Set in the near future, the stories revolve around the evil corporation, 4Ever Innovations, whose young and brilliant scientists download and sell memories. They replace those we've lost with clones and devise technology that helps us live out our greatest fantasies; from saving a failed relationship, to creating the perfect lover, to being irresistible to the opposite sex - but sometimes our deepest desires come at a terrible price. 4Ever offers customers the opportunity to live out their fantasies in a virtual world but there are secrets within 4Ever Innovations that may cost you your life.

programme.title: Journey Through Pinnacles National Park
programme.desc: Immerse yourself in the rugged beauty of Pinnacles National Park, where towering rock spires, serene trails, and sweeping vistas come to life. Journey Through Pinnacles National Park captures the park’s unique landscapes, from sunlit cliffs to quiet caves and abundant wildlife. Let the peaceful sounds and stunning views transport you to one of California’s hidden natural gems. The full 45 minute film is available to subscribers of www.NatureStream.tv

programme.title: Preview for "Journey Along the Oregon Coast"
programme.desc: Experience spectacular coastal landscapes in "Journey Along the Oregon Coast". See dramatic sea stacks illuminated by colorful skies, pristine beaches, spring wildflowers, and even watch a Roosevelt elk gallop along Canon Beach! This relaxing and exhilarating film is accompanied by the soothing sounds of ocean waves and birdsongs. The full film is 85 minutes in length and available to subscribers of www.NatureStream.tv.

programme.title: Wildflowers of Texas Hill Country
programme.desc: Experience the spring bloom of bluebonnets and their colorful companions in this journey through the Texas hill country. Scenes of beautiful wildflowers are accompanied by a relaxing acoustic soundtrack. This full length film is available to subscribers of NatureStream.tv.

programme.title: Preview for Death Valley & Mono Lake Nature Film
programme.desc: Experience the dramatic beauty of Death Valley, from sunrise over the sand dunes to the colorful formations of Zabriske point. Explore the unique limestone formations known as "tufa towers", the amazing bird life, and relaxing serenity of Mono Lake, an inland sea at the base of the Sierra Mountains. Bonus footage of the geothermal "hot creek" in the Sierras. This is a preview for the 1 hour film available at www.NatureStream.tv.

programme.title: Preview for "Journey through Maui"
programme.desc: Relax with scenes from magical Maui. " Journey through Maui" showcases the natural beauty of Maui, featuring stunning sunsets over the ocean, gentle sea turtles swimming close to shore, and powerful waterfalls surrounded by lush greenery. Underwater scenes highlight the island’s vibrant marine life, with colorful fish and coral formations visible in clear, shallow waters. Each shot captures a peaceful, relaxing atmosphere, inviting viewers to experience the calm and wonder of Maui’s landscapes and seascapes. The full two hour film is available to subscribers of NatureStream.tv.

programme.title: Preview for "Autumn's Grace: The Wasatch Mountains"
programme.desc: The Wasatch mountains of Utah display natures finest autumn colors. The stunning spectrum of the landscape ranges from dark reds to bright yellows, splashed across the mountains in exuberant splendor. A soothing acoustic soundtrack accompanies the scenery, filmed from above and within the autumn splendor of the Wasatch mountains. This is a free preview for the 1 hour 50 minute film available to subscribers at www.NatureStream.tv.

programme.title: Preview of The High Sierra
programme.desc: This is a preview of "The High Sierra", available to stream at www.NatureStream.tv. Journey into the highest reaches of the Sierra Nevada Mountains in this stunning video presentation featuring the fine art landscape photography of Elizabeth & Olof Carmel. Amazing scenes from "The Range of Light" are paired with beautiful instrumentals to create a relaxing and inspiring experience. Witness the drama of the seasons from summers magnificent wildflower meadows to the deep snows of winter.

programme.title: Hawaii & The Caribbean
programme.desc: Experience the spectacular beauty of the islands in this 1 hour film featuring the photography of Elizabeth & Olof Carmel. Relax with views of tropical beaches at sunset, aerial views of otherworldly Kauai, and enchanting waterfalls, waves, and sea turtles. This film Includes a soothing island themed soundtrack.

programme.title: Preview for "California's Wild Coast"
programme.desc: Soar with the seabirds over the wild and beautiful north coast of California. The rugged coastline of Mendocino is a vast wilderness full of wildlife, sea caves, bird colonies, and crashing waves that can only be fully appreciated from an aerial view. This 2.5 hour film is an exhilarating flight over this magnificent landscape. Soul stirring ambient music accompanies the spectacular cinematography of "Californias Wild Coast". The full film is available to subscribers of NatureStream.tv

programme.title: Preview of "Hawaii, A Journey Through The Big Island"
programme.desc: Experience Big Island bliss in the stunning 2 hour film, available for streaming on May 16. Soar above waterfalls that plunge into the Pacific, kick back with views of beach sunsets and slow motion waves, enjoy island palms in the gentle island breezes, and experience the Waipio valley paradise from above. Dazzling cinematography is accompanied by a relaxing soundtrack. Available at www.NatureStream.tv. Run time 2 hours.

programme.title: Britney Spears vs. Justin Timberlake
programme.desc: S1:E8 Did Britney Spears really cheat on Justin Timberlake? Britney and Justin were the perfect couple until she was accused of cheating on him after their breakup. Justin told the world his side of the story and the media believed him while Britney was mocked and silenced. The whole world watched as Britney went from being the media’s pop princess to spiralling in a very public meltdown, but what did Justin have to do with it? Our team uncovered the truth behind what really happened, and what Justin’s iconic Cry Me a River video has to do with Britney’s freedom.

programme.title: Dave Bautista & Kumail Nanjiani: True To Yourself
programme.desc: Kumail Nanjiani SHOCKED the world when he achieved an EXTREME body transformation! Despite being a famous comedian, actor, and screenwriter, Kumails real life was NOT all glamorous. What tragedy struck before he could propose to his wife? And how did Dave Bautista make things WORSE?

programme.title: Colin Ferrell & Angelina Jolie: From Rebels To Parents
programme.desc: Hollywood Rebels Colin Farrell and Angelina Jolies deep connection goes far beyond their past romance. Almost two decades later, the two are still very much supportive of one another and share a great deal in common, both being single parents.

programme.title: Arnold Schwarzenegger: Rebuilding Family
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger was forced to be tough at an early age. Abused by his father, Arnold tried to bury his painful past by putting all of his energy into bodybuilding. When he started a family with his wife, everything appeared perfect to the outside world... Until Arnold was publicly exposed for cheating on his wife and destroying his family. Why did Arnold cheat? And how far back do the lies go?

programme.title: Mark Ruffalo & Jennifer Garner: Support In Friendship
programme.desc: One night, Mark Ruffalo woke up SOBBING from a terrible nightmare. He dreamed he received a medical diagnosis FROM HELL, which later became true! His resilience was put to the test. But why did he choose to hide the tragic news from his wife? And what did co-star Jennifer Garner think of him on the set of "13 going on 30"?

programme.title: Naomi Campbell & Nelson Mandella: Defending A Model
programme.desc: Supermodel Naomi Campbell was one of the most in-demand models of her time, but when the violent side of Naomi came out, she faced 7 years in prison! Then... Nelson Mandela stepped in to teach her a powerful lesson. Why did Nelson Mandela defend the world’s most controversial model?

programme.title: Diana & Camilla: A Princess Betrayed
programme.desc: Princess Diana was adored by the outside world. But at home, she SECRETLY dealt with deep sadness and betrayal: Her husband, Prince Charles, was having an affair with Camilla Parker. What happened when Diana finally confronted his mistress?

programme.title: Megan Fox's Hollywood Struggle
programme.desc: Voted “Sexiest Woman Alive”, Megan Fox lived a secret life where she was thrown into dark, inappropriate and disturbing situations as early as 15 years old.

programme.title: Prince Harry: A Fathers Betrayal
programme.desc: When Prince Harry lost his mother Diana at just 12 years old, the whole world was in shock. But behind closed doors, the REAL SHOCKER was the secret feud between Harry and Charles over Diana.

programme.title: Janet Jackson Breaks Her Silence
programme.desc: Janet Jackson reveals the haunting story of how she was treated unfairly in Hollywood after the Super Bowl mishap with Justin Timberlake.

programme.title: Vin & Paul: Forever Family
programme.desc: When the explosive news of Paul Walker’s death surfaced, it shocked the world. The Fast and Furious franchise would never be the same - and Paul’s daughter, Meadow Walker, was left without a father. So why did Paul leave her with Vin Diesel? And what important lesson on parenting did Paul teach Vin before he passed away?

programme.title: Travis and Kourtney: Better for the Kids
programme.desc: Legendary rock star and Blink-182 member Travis Barkers biggest fear came true when in 2008 he survived the impossible... his plane crashed and caught fire. He was one of the lucky two to survive. After fighting for his life in the hospital, he fell into a suicidal spiral taking his family and children down with him, until he realized an important truth. ﻿﻿Will his new relationship with Kourtney Kardashian survive his dark past and who predicted the plane crash before it even happened?

programme.title: Courteney Cox: Never Give Up
programme.desc: Courteney Cox made the world laugh on the hit tv series, ‘Friends’, but when Courteney lost her baby to a miscarriage, she had to fake a smile and hide her secret loss. But Jennifer Aniston knew the truth… What’s the real reason Courteney couldnt have a baby?

programme.title: Find Your Talent
programme.desc: Tom Bilyeu, co-founder of Quest Nutrition and co-founder & CEO of Impact Theory, reveals how this shift in mindset helped him find his passion.

programme.title: The Boy with the Broken Brain
programme.desc: Jim Kwik went from learning-challenged to becoming a world expert in speed-reading and memory improvement. A leading authority on learning, Jim has trained everyone from Fortune 500 CEOs like Elon Musk to Hollywood superstars, Will Smith and Hugh Jackman. If knowledge is power, then learning is your superpower, and Jim shows you how to find it.

programme.title: Chris Gardner: CEO of Happyness
programme.desc: Goalcast EXCLUSIVE! ﻿﻿Remember the movie "The Pursuit of Happyness" starring Will Smith? Some may not know that Chris Gardner is the REAL person behind Will Smiths character.﻿﻿ But until now, a BIG part of his story was never told. In this Goalcast Original, Chris finally opens up to the world about WHAT HAPPENED to him after losing the love of his life.

programme.title: Find Your Way Back
programme.desc: Lisa Nichols delivers a powerful speech on how she struggled with abuse and depression and what these experiences taught her, and shares the best actionable advice on how to overcome even your most troubling times.

programme.title: The Fear in Their Eyes
programme.desc: Unable to pay for his son’s chemotherapy, retired boxer Isea ‘Ice’ Jackson is forced to face off against the most dangerous man alive - undefeated champion Kurt ‘The Mountain’ Backstrom. If Jackson wins, he’ll earn enough money to save his son. But if Backstrom wins, Max could die. How far would you go to save your child’s life?

programme.title: Real Stories With Wim Hof

Wim Hof is a world record breaker and a global phenomenon. He is famous for his superhuman ability to perform extreme long-distance swimming under freezing water. But the Iceman believes he has a special calling in the world.

programme.title: Real Stories With Jordan Peterson

programme.title: Wisdom of a 3rd grade dropout

programme.title: "Late Savings, Month-End Money, and Balanced Living"

programme.title: Secure 2.0 Circus
programme.desc: Saving for retirement can be a bit of a three-ringed circus but Joe Anderson, CFP, and Big Al Clopine, CPA have your ticket to the show! Whether youre retired, saving for retirement, in the military, or paying off student loans, SECURE 2.0 is a massive shift in investment policy, designed to motivate and enable people to save more for retirement to the tune of $40 billion in new savings plans over the next decade not to mention reshaping 401(k)s and RMDs. What does the SECURE Act 2.0 mean for you? Its all under the big top in todays show!

programme.title: Take Control of Your Retirement Plan
programme.desc: When you read the headlines each day do you feel like you are less and less in control of your finances and what will happen to your money in the long term? You are not alone. The fear of the unknown can lead to stress and anxiety. In a recent survey, more people reported fearing retirement as opposed to DEATH! Joe Anderson, CFP, and Big Al Clopine, CPA are going lower your stress level and help you take control of your retirement plan today!

programme.title: America's Dangerous Obsession with Entrepreneurship
programme.desc: "I dont need to tell you about all of the problems with celebrity culture, but America has a more damaging obsession that most people instinctively root for. Entrepreneur culture is costing everybody a lot of money even if they never start a business of their own. So, its time to learn How Money Works to find out why most people shouldnt be entrepreneurs even when everybody says its the greatest thing ever."

programme.title: Hidden Billionaires & Dumb People are Earning More
programme.desc: According to Forbes, America has seven hundred and thirty-five billionaires worth a combined four point five trillion dollars. But how many billionaires are there really? When Forbes publishes their list, they add a small qualifier that almost nobody notices, there are 735 LISTED billionaires in America, because nobody knows how many there are really. Forbes employs more than 50 people in 16 countries to compile their list. According to their methodology article they use public financial records, interviews with employees, rivals, attorneys and they attempt to validate the numbers by contacting the billionaires directly. Some co-operate and give Forbes access to their personal finances so they can report a more accurate number, but magazine admits that most don’t. Much of the list is an estimated guess, but there are also a lot of billionaires out there that will never show up on the list even though they should. One group are the crony government leaders using their countries central bank as their own personal credit card, but I think there is another group that is even more interesting than that. Forbes and Bloomberg who both get a lot of online attention from their billionaires list have behind closed doors admitted that they have no way of keeping track of the most common type of billionaire in America. In an interview with the New York Times, Kerry Dolan the editor who overseas the Forbes team responsible for the annual list gave the profile of a billionaire that they would never be able to find. She told the times that “it’s someone who quietly sold a stake in a business for, say, $250 million in the ’90s, then invested it well.”… That’s it, that’s all there is to it. Two hundred and fifty million dollars is a big exit especially back in the nineties, but it wouldn’t have made the news unless it was a well-known household brand. Most good businesses of this size are boring and only sell their products to other businesses. As a former investment banker who has worked on a lot of these deals personally, I can

programme.desc: When a string of unexplained deaths occur at Ashburn Waters Campgrounds, the facility is forced to close its gates for the safety of the public. Months later, authorities still have no leads, and the campgrounds lay dormant. Until Easter weekend, when a group of campers sneak in, as they failed to book a site anywhere else on Australia's busiest camping weekend. Among them is Brett, a young man going through a hard time in his life. The source of which is his now ex-girlfriend Scout, who brought along her new love interest just to rub it in his face. And to make matters worse, something is killing off his friends, one by one. Who or what is killing the campers at Ashburn Waters?

programme.title: Paddling The Petawawa River
programme.desc: A World Champion kayaker, the author of twelve best-selling instructional books and videos on paddling, and a YouTube influencer with approximately 14 million views to his videos, Ken Whiting is the host of Facing Waves. Now entering it's 8th season, Facing Waves celebrates the cultures, landscapes and adventures that surround the world’s top paddling destinations. The popular TV series resonates with those who share a passion for the outdoors and seek out authentic experiences.

programme.title: UTA: The Climb For Kosovo
programme.desc: In 2017, 34 year-old Uta Ibrahimi became the first person from Kosovo to attempt Everest. Born and raised in eastern Kosovo, her childhood was interrupted by a fierce ethnic war that ripped the heart out of the Balkan nation. Battling against Kosovo’s entrenched gender stereotypes and misogyny within the climbing community, Uta climbed the highest peaks in Kosovo, and then Europe.

programme.title: A Smighty Fairy Tale
programme.desc: Leila and Zip go on an adventure to find the magical fairies of the forest. Sneevil has used magic to pretend to be a fairy and is looking to destroy them and steal the Earth Stone. With the help of the real forest fairies, the Super Six take back the Stone and save the day.

programme.title: Playmates
programme.desc: A peaceful day. Don is watering his plants and suddenly the water stops. He jerks the hose, pokes a stick into it, but doesn’t realize that it’s the mice who are causing this water explosion! Don has to take revenge, and this time he sits on his couch with a bunch of fire crackers! Will he set the house on fire?

programme.title: An Eerie Hustle
programme.desc: Don finally gets to play tit for tat with the mice and they are running for their lives. Don’s house turns into haunted house and the ghost of Don is hungry for some dead meat preferably dead mice meat.

programme.title: Rose Trick
programme.desc: Dunky is taking special care of a beautiful red rose in his garden which he plans to give it to his girlfriend in the evening. And has just stopped Cat from almost ruining it.

programme.title: Teddy Bear
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: Pirate Song
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: Country Mouse and City Mouse
programme.desc: Country Mouse GoGo receives a letter from his urban friend UGo, and leaves for the city.

programme.title: Sneezils
programme.desc: When Sneevil creates the Sneezils flu, all the Smighties get infected, except for Zip who has to take care of them while defending the Castle from Villains.

programme.title: Ghost Mansion
programme.desc: Keet and Cat’s chase ends up in a haunted house…with a crazy ghost living in it. The ghost loves Keet and wants to have her as a pet for himself.

programme.title: Hungabunga
programme.desc: Sneevils evil plant, the hunga bunga, grows out of control and captures the Smighties. Its up to Dude and his fish friends to stop it.

programme.title: SMART YOGURT
programme.desc: Niya unwittingly falls for Durian Grey’s latest ploy; Dojo infiltrating yoghurt chumplings.

programme.title: An Alien Visit
programme.desc: It’s a nice cold night and Keet is resting on the terrace of the house enjoying the night stars. Suddenly a small space ship crash lands on the terrace and a cute little alien the same size of Keet comes out.

programme.title: HYPNO-TACO
programme.desc: A new taco stand that has abruptly popped up overnight next to the tea shop. Strangely, though the tacos smell anything but tasty, the customers flock to it and Chai Raja sends Sundar to deal with matters. But that compounds the disaster as Sundar too turns his back at Chai Raja and starts guarding/waiting at the Taco stand with double his usual smartness! Though this gives Basha full freedom to raid the banana fries at the tea shop, Chai Rajas long face tugs at this heartstrings and Basha nips over to the taco stand to take a look at things. Thats when he realizes that the taco stand owner is in fact a rogue hypnotist from Bashas old circus who is literally hypnotizing the customers and Sundar to munch his Mexican lunch! Cracking his knuckles in glee, Basha sets about driving the rogue out of his mind and business. But a hypnotized Sunder is more powerful than ever, and Basha get whacked here and there in the ordeal. At last Basha gives a nice knock on Sundars head and he is back at the tea shop and Basha and Sundar together makes sure that the taco shop-owner runs for his dear life, much to Chai Rajas relief.

programme.title: All Through the House
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: Colour Chaos
programme.desc: Mayor De Pfeffel can’t decide what colour to paint the town hall as it is so dull and grey. So Deedee offers to help, without magic this time, by getting a town vote as to which colour is liked best. Deedee and Nino go ahead and do just that, asking each and everybody they see in Abra-Dabra and noting their choice of colours. Boris and Sandy are confused so set out to paint and decide, but end up messing up the wall. They seek the help of Deedee, who is all so ready to help. But Nino is scared things will get worse with the powerful magic spell, and with good reason. The spell not only “cleaned” Charlie’s wall but made grey stripes on the walls of every house in Abra-Dabra! Even Tiggy’s yellow house is all grey!! So Deedee and everybody else pitch in and paint every house back to its original colour. So the final building standing is the town hall, but no one has sufficient pain for any one colour. So they finally decide to paint it with every colour they have, like a rainbow!

programme.title: TIMBER!!
programme.desc: There is unusual rush at the tea shop as customers seem to be pouring in. Chai Raja efficiently whips up teas but they are running short of chairs. Sundar runs pillar to post to seat the customers, even though Basha is trying his best to trip him up. Sundar then has an unusual brainwave- sure that he will impress his boss, Sundar throws open the closet and pulls out some chairs that had been stacked in a while ago. Proudly he sets them up and looks over to Chai Raja for a pat on the back- but then termites march out from under the old chairs...up and down the shop, chewing the tables/chairs...Sundar runs to keep them from crashing but Basha is all for helping the termites out. He glibly channels them this way and that and Chai Raja gawks as his customers who sit on chairs end up squatting on sawdust. Chai Raja discovers that its Sundars brainwave thats responsible for this wave of pests! Its crunch time for the termites and Sundar...and he better hurry else Chai Raja will be left with handle-less pans and a pile of dust instead of furniture!

programme.title: LOTTERY
programme.desc: Chai Raja buys a lottery ticket from a ticket seller who passes by. Chai Raja dreams of him in a 7 storeyed teashop, with many Sundars cleaning and serving around. Getting out of his dream, Chai Raja writes down the number on the wall and hands the ticket to Sundar. Sundar, caught up in his chores tucks it away in his tent but forgets about it. Next day Sundar look at the newspaper and is stunned to see that the ticket has won the prize!Sundar searches high and low inside his paraphernalia, watched by Basha till he finally finds it in his tent. Sundar lapses into a day-dream in which he owns the 7 storeyed teashop with Chai Raja at his service and Basha cleaning around. However, Basha pokes his tail popping the dream and dashes off with the ticket. A mad chase, ensues as Sundar tries to get back the ticket. Basha wants the ticket for himself so that his own dream may come true that of being the owner of the 7 storeyed teashop with bananas all around and Chai Raja, his personal chef. (Sundar will be the entertainment). The chase starts now for the ticket. Chai Raja has no clue as to what is happening. As the chase happens, the greedy customers want to get their hands on it as well. The ticket finally falls and there is a pile-up outside the shop as everyone dives for it. Sundar emerges, dishevelled and bruised but holding the ticket- only to have it chewed by a nanny goat! By then Chai Raja arrives at the scene realizing what just happened.

programme.title: BIG BUNNY
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to prepare a big feast. Pai sees this as his chance to impress the Elders and earn a new weapon to replace his Mystic Stick. But when he goes to collect the rare striped carrot (a crucial ingredient for his dish), he’s attacked by a Giant Bunny Mutant sent by Negu. His Mystic Stick helps him defeat the Mutant, so he’s content with his weapon…for now.

programme.title: Charlies Castle
programme.desc: It’s Uncle Charlie’s birthday and the twins have surprised him with a nap mask and breakfast, but the twins want to celebrate a little more by throwing a party and inviting all their friends. Although Charlie wishes to have a more peaceful celebration, he gives in to the pleas of Boris and Sandy. After getting a hint from Charlie on how much he loves chess, boris and sandy plan the birthday party around a ‘knights and castles’ theme. The twins get Deedee to bring balloons, a castle cake with turrets from Tiggy and a jousting dance from Mewmew. Boris and Sandy set out to decorate Uncle Charlie’s house, just in time for their friends coming in with all the goodies for the party. They even invent a balloon jousting game between Deedee and Mewmew that makes Mewmew crash into Tiggy’s cake and thereby wreck all the arrangements much to the dismay of the twins. This calls for Deedee’s magic where all the party ingredients are put into a large purple cauldron and it makes a gigantic bouncing castle in the chequerboard garden. And the snoring sounds lead them to find Uncle Charlie napping right inside it. They bounce around Uncle Charlie as much as they can and then wind down for a long snooze. Uncle Charlie awakes to happily find that the twins have organised his most best birthday slumber party ever.

programme.title: Maroon
programme.desc: When Kala tells Gummy and Harry that her favourite color is maroon, the pair decide to give her an ‘all maroon’ birthday surprise – but they soon learn that there can sometimes be ‘too much of a good thing’.

programme.title: Smorigins
programme.desc: The Super Six go back in time to find out the origins of the Smighty Stones. The Villains tag along, too and find themselves in the middle of a prehistoric dragon battle.

programme.title: AWARD PE AWARD
programme.desc: A local committee makes a surprise visit to hotel Kelifornia and presents Chai Raja with the Best Chef Award. Chai Raja is thrilled and places the award on the shelf and gives the duty of safe-guarding it to Sundar. And suddenly Basha develops a fascination for the trophy. Instantly, poor Sundars life turns into living hell. Things reach a crazy climax when the trophy from Sundars hands falls on the ground and breaks into a hundred pieces right in front of Chai Rajas eyes. Chai Raja is literally shivering in fury, Sundar is literally shivering in fear and Basha is literally shivering trying to control his laughter. And that very moment the local committee comes again with a larger trophy. A surprised Chai Raja gracefully takes a bow to accept yet another award. But to everyones sheer shock, the committee gives the trophy to Sundar for being the best waiter. And Chai Raja and Basha faint instantly...followed by Sundar!!!

programme.title: Smighty Claus
programme.desc: Sneevil dresses up like Smighty Claus to ruin Smighty Christmas. Can Melody and the rest of the Super Six stop him before he steals all the presents in Smightyland.

programme.title: NOW YOU TEA ME
programme.desc: Basha sits plotting his next move to divest the snack shelf off more kachoris when he is surprised to find his banana mocktail being drained by someone invisible. Basha soon finds out its a chameleon with a super camouflage- and the best part? If Basha too touches it, for a short while, he too can camouflage to merge with the immediate surrounding! Basha rushes to use the chameleon as to grab the kachoris. Sundar is indeed stumped for a while as he sees the kachoris magically disappear and pranks magically make him stumble and mess up the order. But then he hears Bashas chuckle and staying hidden, finds out Bashas secret. Sundar immediately tricks the chameleon out of Bashas hands and voila! Now Sundar is camouflaging. Gleefully, Sundar just starts exacting revenge when to his horror, he finds that the chameleon is an even bigger thief than Basha who is guzzling the tea as well as snacks set for the customers. Chai Raja who catches a glimpse of Sundar camouflaging after touching the chameleon and then watches the snacks and tea disappearing immediately suspects him. Sundar must now clear his image quick else he will be cleared out of Hotel California once and for all.

programme.title: GAME OVER
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to climb a mountain and ring a bell. Seeing his henchmen distracted by an old videogame, Negu sends the game up to the Yan World to distract the Guardians. Xia and Pai become obsessed with the game, stealing it back and forth from each other.

programme.title: A Packet of Gummy
programme.desc: Gummy, Kala and Harry get caught up in an escalating competition to get the whole collection of cereal box ‘free surprises’ – with each of them only missing the super-rare little plastic unicorn.

programme.title: The Lord, Lost
programme.desc: When Xia and April go to fetch Pai after he’s spent the night guarding the Magic Fort, they find out that the Glove of the North has disappeared. While they blame Pai for the disaster, Amkko and Koto steal the Lord of the Wind. The Guardians try to get it back, only to discover it was all a cunning plan to distract them and steal the Glove of the North! But hadn’t they stolen it already? No! Pai was keeping it safe in a place they would never have guessed.

programme.title: Dunky's Laundry
programme.desc: GrandPa has entrusted Dunky to get his special Yellow shirt washed and ironed ready. Meanwhile a funny sequence of events and chase is happening between Cat and Keet.

programme.title: The Zoo Trip
programme.desc: Chaos unfolds as Chottu Mottu Lambu Don and Colonel decide to make a trip to the zoo. Starting from feeding the animals, from sneaking into the control room and opening the enclosures and racing crocodiles, they mess it all.

programme.title: OH, RATS!
programme.desc: It’s quiet…TOO quiet, according to Pai, who’s convinced Negu’s about to attack. Pai prepares a trap. But the evil lord of the Chou World is depressed by all his failures. Mei decides to launch an attack himself. He can only get one mutant rat to follow him…who in turn is followed by lots of fellow mutant rats. The Guardians laugh at Mei and his rats, but the rats have a secret weapon: horrible, high-pitched SCREAMS! Pai knits earmuffs for himself, April, and Xia, then lures the rats onto his trap with cheese. In the end, Pai savors the silence.

programme.title: Magic Magic
programme.desc: Cat has to find new ways of catching Keet so as he sees the snake charmer on the street he gets a idea and quietly snatches away the flute of the charmer and runs back to the house to hypnotize Cat with it.

programme.title: The North Wind and the Sun
programme.desc: The North Wind and the Sun collide over whos stronger. They set a bet, to see who can make the passing traveler take off his jacket first.

programme.title: Spooktacular.
programme.desc: The gang is ‘haunted’ by a mystery spook – and sets out to overcome their collective fear and get to the bottom of the scary mystery.

programme.title: Camping Trip
programme.desc: In a multi-coloured SUV, Don and Colonel with their bagpacks zipped are set for a camping trip. Watch them in close contact with nature and “trouble”.

programme.title: Newspaper
programme.desc: The best news is that Hepi and Briko have figured out some exciting DIYs!

programme.title: Bear essentials
programme.desc: The twins help a young owl who misses her best friend bear.

programme.title: Toothbrush
programme.desc: Be prepared to be brushed off your feet with this entertaining episode

programme.title: Atchoo!
programme.desc: The Guardians meet a very cute mutant with a terrible cold. They decide to adopt it and name it Atchoo. When the Guardians see that the gates of the Magic Fort standing open, they think Atchoo has betrayed them. But in fact, Atchoo has been captured by Amkko and Koto, who wanted to get Negu’s defective mutant back again. The Guardians free their friend and discover that the only ones at the Magic Fort were the Wise Elders, doing a spot of cleaning.

programme.title: Comet Run
programme.desc: X begins acting strangely, creating tension with Speed and the others. When X leaves to join the Shadowy Organization, Speed decides to infiltrate the Shadowy Org to save him. Speed soon discovers that X is working undercover. When Xs cover is blown, he and Speed must try and escape the Shadowy Organization HQ with the missing Part.

programme.title: The Happy Prince
programme.desc: The south-bound Swallow sits on the Happy Prince statue. However, unlike its name the Prince statue is crying. The Swallow postpones his trip and decides to help the Prince.

programme.title: Dress code
programme.desc: The twins find themselves in a world where they can’t get into a party because they’re not wearing the right clothes.

programme.title: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: A notorious robber has come to rob GrandPA’s house. He has with him a fancy paint and brush which can makes him blend seamlessly into anything.

programme.title: Mini Fix
programme.desc: Colonel is building a HUGE MINIATURE city out of LEGO-like blocks. There are trees and roads and houses with windows and tall buildings and a hospital and a police station and prison and pools. Now what could go wrong here???

programme.title: Fly Away Nino
programme.desc: Nino and Mewmew are making paper planes, but as Mewmew didn’t follow all the instructions Nino’s flies so well and much farther. And not just Nino, the twins too have fun seeing their planes fly so well. But no matter how much Mewmew tries it doesn’t fly like the planes of the others. Mewmew wishes her planes flew too so she asks Deedee to work some magic for her. So Deedee casts an ‘all day flying’ spell onto Mewmew’s plane but Nino comes in-between and gets hit by the spell on his helmet. Now Nino can’t stop flying and zooms away all over Abra-Dabra. He flies so wildly that he send Mayor De Pfeffle for a spin after knocking over his flower display. Nino is sorry for being so carried away that he tries to land, but to his surprise the helmet keeps pulling him skyward. Charlie tries weighing Nino down with his heavy mail bag, but the helmet is too strong for even Charlie to grab a hold of that Nino is flung away higher and farther. Nino promises to deliver the mail, much to the happiness of Charlie who can get a much deserved nap for all the effort. So begins Abra-Dabra’s very own first ‘air’-mail courtesy of Nino. Deedee comes up with a plan to help the ‘jet-lagged’ Nino after being inspired by the paper planes Mewmew makes. She shouts out to Nino to use a long sheet of paper from the mail bag and make a plane ‘Mewmew style’ with the wings pointing downwards. The plan works and Nino is able to fly right into Mewmew’s house and the magic wears-off as the sun sets in Abra-Dabra. In all the fuss Mewmew understands what made her planes not to fly, which actually helped Nino come down, and makes her paper planes fly so well now, thanks to Deedee.

programme.title: Pancake Icorn
programme.desc: When Pancake is having a particularly bad day, he imagines a better life – then becomes a Zoonicorn!, Appreciating the normal yet wonderful and special things in life that happen every day.

programme.title: Sponge
programme.desc: Soak up the creativity like a sponge would, lets see what Hepi and Briko are up to

programme.title: FRUITFUL MULTIPLICATION
programme.desc: Four green Fruit Ninjas find their first real-life enemy in the form of an ancient ninja with a score to settle.

programme.title: Wasteland
programme.desc: The twins clean a wasteland to make it a nicer playground to play in.

programme.title: A Packet of Gummy
programme.desc: Gummy, Kala and Harry get caught up in an escalating competition to get the whole collection of cereal box ‘free surprises’ – with each of them only missing the super-rare little plastic unicorn.

programme.title: Abracadabra
programme.desc: Keet is tired of Cat chasing her all the time. She finds a book in the attic on “Great magic tricks” and soon masters them. now its time to use them.

programme.title: The Bigger The Lie
programme.desc: ODESSA thinks she’s gotten away with a little white lie until she visits the Zooniverse where she meets the FIBASAURUS – a tiny, fantastical creature that grows bigger and bigger with every fib that Odessa tells until it is a towering monster capable of upending the Zooniverse!. Little white lies can only grow larger and larger.

programme.title: An Alien Visit
programme.desc: It’s a nice cold night and Keet is resting on the terrace of the house enjoying the night stars. Suddenly a small space ship crash lands on the terrace and a cute little alien the same size of Keet comes out.

programme.title: Krazy Kites
programme.desc: The sky is filled with lovely colors and looks amazing with so many kites. Keet, Cat and Dunky are on the terrace flying kites .

programme.title: The Big Freeze
programme.desc: Charlie is found napping on the job. Deedee and Nino encourage him as being the best postman ever and that anyone would doze off in the sweltering heat. Charlie assures Tiggy that he will take special care of Tiggy’s parcel and off he goes near fainting in the sweaty heat. Charlie even turns down the twins offer to help. In the heat, Charlie makes a wrong turn and reaches town-hall instead of Tiggy’s home, but still presses on to accomplish his mission. En route the special package starts to leak unawares of Charlie who is too tired and stops for a “quick” nap after nearly bumping into the Doobydoos. Deedee and Nino are searching for Charlie and find him at long last. Dejected, Charlie calls himself the worst postman in the world having melted all of Tiggy’s vanilla ice-cream. Charlie wishes Deedee to use her magic, much to the horror of Nino who hides off. Deedee’s magic refreezes not only the ice-cream, but Charlie as well! Rounding up Deedee’s friends they all take turns in delivering the letters and special parcel to keep Charlie’s goodwill intact. Mewmew is too fast that the letters fly our of the bag and the Doobydoos are too short to reach the mail boxes and the twins have a tough time reading the addresses. Finally all the tired and thoroughly perspired friends acknowledge how great Charlie is as a postman. As Charlie is now free to move, they are all surprised by Tiggy’s special delivery of ice-creams he specially made for him favourite postman. Charlie gets a well deserved nap right in front of his giggling friends.

programme.title: Cruise Blues
programme.desc: On the deck of the cruise, Titanic-style Don and Colonel stand facing the sea, enjoying the breeze until the shark leaps up in the air. Where ever Don is, Charly Lary and Marly are sure to follow. Watch them battle sharks and take on the sea!

programme.title: Alone Again Unnaturally
programme.desc: When Pancake goes away to summer camp, Maple has no one to play with. In the Zooniverse, the Zoonicorns are gone as well, and she must team up with Harold to find them! Always be willing to make new friends.

programme.title: River of Time
programme.desc: An impatient Pancake must wait a WHOLE DAY to bake a cake with Mama but learns different methods of patience in the Zooniverse, where time keeps slowing down. How to manage waiting and delays with a bit of patience and optimism

programme.title: Harold's Missing Spoon
programme.desc: On a gusty day, Pancake has lost his favorite hat, and he’s looked EVERYWHERE, finally giving up and thinking maybe someone snatched it – Maple. The younger otter denies it (despite a history of “borrowing” stuff from Pancake and not putting any of it back), but Pancake doesn’t believe her. He goes to sleep thinking his little sister has his hat.When he arrives in the Zooniverse, he finds the Zoonicorns are in the midst of a Harold Crisis: the bear has lost one of his prized spoons!

programme.title: Super Fun Color Run
programme.desc: Sneevil tries to sabotage the Smighties annual Colour Festival by cementing the competing Smighties with his newest contraption. The Super Six must get colorfully creative to stop him.

programme.title: Makeup Whose Mind
programme.desc: When Odessa can’t decide which Zoonicorn stuffy to take with her on a weekend trip, she ends up having a competition in the Zooniverse between the real Zoonicorns to see who to choose. It’s not whether you win or lose, but how you play the game.

programme.title: Rewind Wand
programme.desc: Nino and Deedee are out for a stroll and hear a familiar snore. Seeing postman Charlie taking a nap, they make a pillow with stones for Charlie to help him nap better. Just then Mewmew bumps into them with a jammed roller skate stuck to his leg. Deedee wants to help but she doesn’t have her magic wand, so rushes off home to get it. En route Tiggy needs help with his whisk that isn’t working and he needs to finish whisking a large batch of cupcakes. This makes Deedee rush along faster. On the way she sees the Doobydoos stuck up a rock crying out for help. She really needs her wand to help everyone, but she cannot even find the wand in her home. Nino and Deedee run out to trace their steps back along with the twins and Charlie’s hammock. Nino and Deedee use the hammock as a safety net to get the Doobydoos down from the rock. With all the Doobydoos, he helps Tiggy by presenting him with an army of whiskers. Having the work all done, Deedee takes a bowl of lemon icing to pour into Mewmew’s rollerblade shoes, and it easily comes loose. All of the rescued and helped friends of Deedee muster up to find her magic wand. Charlie sleepily walks in scratching his back, complaining of something poking him all the time during his nap, which turned out to be Deedee’s wand! Everyone’s in for a treat of freshly baked cupcakes. It certainly turned out to be an exciting non-magic day but with the magical power of friendship

programme.title: San Juan Night
programme.desc: To get some alone time with the beautiful Nora, Fred must jump through multiple hoops, including saving the town’s history book from a fire.

programme.title: Mango Season
programme.desc: It’s the mango season and Dunky has to guard all the mangoes so that no one will steal them. He has taken the help of Cat and Keet to guard them from Hoodie and the mean cat gang.

programme.title: Tiggy’s Big Feast
programme.desc: Tiggy is all flustered and confused as he’s not prepared, nor has any idea what to make for a surprise lunch he promised Mayor De Pfeffel. Seems Deedee’s magic is the only answer. The spell she conjures makes Tiggy be totally decided on the recipe that he sees first. And when the spell is cast, the recipe book opens up exactly at the recipe of a pie made of Tika Pila flowers. The problem is that only the Doobydoos can pick the Tika Pila flowers as it grows in the most prickly cacti in Abra-Dabra! But no matter how much Deedee and Nino coax Tiggy to work on another recipe; Tiggy is totally fixated on the Tika Pila flower pie. Though the Doobydoos love eating the flowers, they are too scared of the loud and angry Tika Pila monster that guards them and rush off in a hurry. They finally hit a bargain with Tiggy in exchange for a hundred custard sandwiches. Only with much reassuring and coaxing they pick every Tika Pila flower around. Mayor De Pfeffel is already at Tiggy’s and really hungry. But one Doobydoo is too ambitious and stays back to pick the last Tika Pila flower, but that awakes the Tika Pila monster and he shouts the biggest shout ever, scaring Tiggy and making the pie fly up high and splatter down on his face! The inevitable terrible has happened and there is nothing to give the Mayor. Just then when things couldn’t get any worse Mayor De Pfeffel lunges inside and is happy to see a whole plate of his favourite custard sandwiches.

programme.title: Street Cats
programme.desc: Cat is king at GrandPA’s house but out on the street it’s a different story. The “Mean Cats” are a local gang of street cats that always pull a fast one on Cat.

programme.title: The Princess Of The Lake – Swan Lake
programme.desc: THE PRINCESS OF THE LAKE – SWAN LAKE

programme.title: Smighty Claus
programme.desc: Sneevil dresses up like Smighty Claus to ruin Smighty Christmas. Can Melody and the rest of the Super Six stop him before he steals all the presents in Smightyland.

programme.title: The Secret Book – Sleeping Beauty Case 2
programme.desc: Sandra and her assistant, Fo, travel into the story of “The Sleeping Beauty”, having been called out by the three good fairies. The Prince has been turned to stone by a mysterious spell, just when he was about to reach the castle, where he would kiss her, thus waking her up. The three fairies have tried to break the spell with their magic wands, but to no avail. Sandra will soon discover that the culprit is the Evil Fairy, who gets her spells from a secret book. Only if they can get hold of that book will the three fairies be able to bring the Prince back to life. Plucking up all their courage, Sandra and Fo will enter the evil fairy’s sinister castle in search of the mysterious secret book.

programme.title: A Book for a Book
programme.desc: Cat is sick of Keet winning all the time. He runs through the newspapers and sees an ad of a book ”10 ways to catch a parrot”.

programme.title: Froggy Friends
programme.desc: The frogs from the well are good friends of Keet so when ever Cat tries to enter the house to steal something from the kitchen they will croak and Keet.

programme.title: Invincible Dragon - Saitn George’s Legend
programme.desc: SANDRA visits her UNCLE TONY at the old funfair where he works and is shocked to hear that it is about to shut down, because of falling visitor numbers. When she is on the ghost train, she is visited by her assistant FO, who has come to get her for a new case in the “Land of Fairytales”. On this occasion, SANDRA and FO travel into the legend of “Saint George and the Dragon”, where they face a very singular DRAGON.

programme.title: Music Mayhem
programme.desc: Whoever heard of Ipods short circuiting? To add to that rigged head phones, musical bombs and bombastic explosions that takes them to outer space. The brother duo gets mummified ultimately but still there is no end to this musical mayhem.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time Part 2
programme.desc: After accidentally landing Aladdin in jail, Jamillah comes up with a brilliant plan to break him out. Dressed as a guard, Jamillah approaches the cell and confidently tells the dozy guard that he is dismissed. Her confidence confuses him and she and Genie get Aladdin out. Aladdin cant believe he has a genie and races off shouting joyfully to all of Baghdad.

programme.title: Red Rubber Ball
programme.desc: Odessa loses her beloved rubber ball and learns how to deal with loss. Loss is part of life.

programme.title: The New Otter In Town
programme.desc: After thinking that his mother doesnt know what its like to be a kid, in the Zooniverse, Pancake becomes friends with a fun otter kid - who turns out to be his mom!. Judging people/People are often more than what they seem

programme.title: The Riddle Champion - Rumpelstiltskin
programme.desc: SANDRA and FO travel into the story of Rumpelstiltskin, by the Brothers Grimm, having been called out by the young QUEEN, the protagonist of the story. Something terrible and very strange has happened: the SERVANT, who the QUEEN sent to find out the DWARF’s name, has not returned. As the QUEEN did not know his name, the DWARF has taken her baby. SANDRA and FO set off in search of the little prince and to take on the powerful, magic RUMPELSTILTSKIN, who is a great enthusiast of riddles and puzzles.

programme.title: The Violinist
programme.desc: Gummy finds an old violin and, on discovering that he’s a distant descendant famous musician of “Gummy Stradi-bear-ius”, he starts playing the violin non-stop... driving everyone around him completely nuts.

programme.title: Bad Wolf_Based On Three Little Pigs
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the tale of The Three Little Pigs. There, the story ended some time ago. The WOLF burnt his bum trying to get in down the chimney, and the LITTLE PIGS were saved thanks to their house made of bricks. But, though some time has now passed, the ELDEST LITTLE PIG continues to forbid his brothers from leaving the house, out of fear of the WOLF. The MIDDLE and YOUNGEST LITLE PIGS are fed up and are convinced that the WOLF has changed and is now a good wolf. SANDRA and FO must discover the truth, by investigating the WOLF, who now appears to be a model citizen, a vegetarian whose hobby is DIY. Nothing is what it seems.

programme.title: Perdóname por amarte
programme.desc: Una ama de casa es culpada de asesinar a la amante de su esposo.

programme.title: Perdóname por amarte
programme.desc: Una ama de casa es culpada de asesinar a la amante de su esposo.

programme.title: Enamorarse otra vez
programme.desc: Tras una dolorosa ruptura, la periodista Dana se encuentra atrapada en un retiro de yoga para parejas.

programme.title: Por amor
programme.desc: Liudmila tiene 40 años, está separada y se la pasa soñando con tener una apasionada aventura.

programme.title: Por amor
programme.desc: El aburrido matrimonio de Román se termina cuando él se enamora de una modelo webcam en una página de porno.

programme.title: Por amor
programme.desc: ¿Por qué una relación llena de alegría y pasión deja de funcionar? Es lo que se preguntan Bodán y Olesia.

programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Incredible Tales 8
programme.desc: The Spooktacular series, Incredible Tales featuring the paranormal encounters of ordinary people, returns for an 8th installment.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Scotty Finds a Home 1935
programme.desc: A young anthropomorphic kitten wants a pet. He happens to find a puppy with no owner and takes him in. When the Scotty tracks mud into the house, Grandma says that her grandson cannot keep him. A transient bulldog is walking by as Grandma puts a pie in the windowsill to cool. He barges into the house and terrorizes the family, demanding they feed him. Scotty rushes back to the house and saves the family, causing Grandma to decide that they can keep him after all.

programme.title: Betty Boop with Henry the Funniest Living American-1935
programme.desc: Henry, comic strip character, gets a job at Betty Boop's pet store

programme.title: Cookin' with Gags 1955
programme.desc: The boys are taking Olive on a picnic. It's April 1, and Bluto plays a series of "jokes" on Popeye, though of course they go beyond the bounds of acceptability, particularly once they get to the picnic grounds; Bluto puts gasoline on the fire he asks Popeye to light and swaps a beehive for the lemonade. Bluto then launches a cruel joke against Olive and frames Popeye. The capper: he replaces Popeye's spinach with a joke can, and runs off with Olive for some canoeing. But Popeye gets the last laugh with an inflatable sea monster.

programme.title: Insect to Injury 1956
programme.desc: Popeye tries to get rid of termites before they ruin his newly built house.

programme.title: The Good Egg 1939

programme.title: The Loudspeaker-1934

programme.title: Mabel, Fatty and the Law
programme.desc: In a small city park where strict vigilance is maintained against flirting. Mabel, a young and pretty wife with a bore of a husband innocently amuses herself with the harmless attentions of Fatty. Fatty relishes the situation all the more because this is one of those rare occasions, when he has succeeded in escaping from the jailer-like watchfulness of his wife. Meanwhile, Fatty's wife and Mabel's husband are carrying on a similar game. They are discovered by the police and a sensational arrest ensues. Both couples appear in court, where numerous complications make a reel full of fun.

programme.title: Lonely Wives-1931
programme.desc: A lonely husband whose wife has been away hires a lookalike impersonator to fill his place and fool his mother-in-law while he plays around with a pretty coquette. Confusion prevails when his wife returns that evening

programme.title: The Flying Deuces 1939
programme.desc: Ollie has fallen in love with the innkeeper's daughter in Paris. The only problem - she's very much in love with her husband. To forget her he joins the Foreign Legion with Stan. Bad idea.

programme.desc: The Pawnee strip is a piece of Federal land that has long been a haven for outlaws. When the government finally sends an officer down to Wileyville so they can open up the strip for homesteading, the courier is killed. Determined to get the strip open for homesteading, Bill, Calamity, Judge Wiley, and the Reverend, set out to get the petition signatures needed to make it official.

programme.title: Confessions Of A Time Traveler The Man From 3036
Among Us UFO Witnesses And Whistleblowers
Guest Charles Blow
programme.desc: Charles Blow is a New York Times writer with a big idea: Black people should move back down South to create Black majority states and grow our political power. It’s a fascinating idea that we have to argue about.

programme.title: Guest Be My Fiasco
programme.desc: Be My Fiasco joins the show to talk about her new album, “Pretty Little Love.”

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: The Rev. Dr. Al Sharpton delivers a daily video message encouraging you to act with intent and purpose. Every day brings new challenges and opportunities. reACT accordingly!

programme.title: Guest Tameka Foster Raymond
programme.desc: Tanya Hart speaks with actors, recording artists and creatives in the entertainment industry.

programme.title: Guest Dedrick Asante-Muhammad
programme.desc: AURN White House Correspondent Ebony McMorris sits down with the President of the ‪Joint Center Dedrick Asante-Muhammad for a conversation about power, policy and the price of progress for Black America under the Donald Trump‬ administration.

programme.title: Guest Talib Kweli
programme.desc: Talib Kweli is a legendary MC and an old friend so we keep it real in this convo about how he works with Yasiin Bey aka Mos Def and why he loves to argue with people online Amazing convo. After we wrapped he said thanks for letting get into the online stuff. No one ever asks about that. We kept it real.

programme.title: Enough Already!
programme.desc: You are enough. In “Enough Already!” Lisa Harper reminds us we don’t have to do anything to earn God’s love — it’s our inheritance as His sons and daughters.

programme.title: Instruments Of Victory
programme.desc: In “Instruments Of Victory,” we’re reminded that victory comes when we place our gifts and even our insecurities in God’s hands.

programme.title: Now What?
programme.desc: In “Now What?,” Pastor Holly Furtick explains that the outcome of your story is determined by how you respond to the problem — so stay present and see what God does next.

programme.title: God Can Use This Too
programme.desc: Just because you didn’t choose it, doesn’t mean God won’t use it. Start to view the challenges and obstacles you face through the lens of God’s limitless creativity.

programme.title: God Will Work It In!
programme.desc: Sometimes, even when your situation isn’t getting better, you are. Stop stressing like you need to do it alone and remember that God is with you in it. He’s already given you what you need — and He’ll help you work it in to what you’re facing.
